name: Animation & Prototype Playground
description:
Hello Everyone,


This is my 2nd open source contribution in the Figma community and it contains all the animations & prototypes I've created during the course of Figma Sessions.


My goal with this file is to help you learn animation and advanced prototyping in Figma. You can view the different prototype settings by going to the Prototype Tab and checking the different values.


Hope you enjoy using this file and come up with your own animations too.


In case of queries, write to me at notkarankapoor@gmail.com
